_sText:
MG ROTA DERP V1_1

This map was created for Gamebanana's Twisted Reality contest.

The key features are the following:

  • 64 player spawn
  • cubemaps
  • custom made particles
  • custom made sounds and soundscapes
  • custom made animated models
  • 8 portals leading to different areas + a final stage
  • checkpoints
  • a boss with dynamic movement, health and attacks. Including a HP meter with more/less HP depending on the amount of players present

V1_1

  • fixed the crash in the fetus area
  • doubled the HP of the boss

I hope that my work will result in your enjoyment, have a good one and i'll see you ingame. Best regards! ;)

Do not edit and/or reupload this map, do not copy parts from this map without asking either. Feel free to decompile the map to look at how things were done though.

Any questions, bugs or suggestions? Send them to Pellevoice@gmail.com
